func.title: GetAnimationName

param.name: animation_number
param.desc: Animation number of the animation whose name to retrieve.

param.name: attach_number
param.desc: If given, refers to the number of the attached mesh to query instead of the object's main mesh.

func.desc: Returns the name of the animation with the given number. If there is no such animation with the given number or the number refers to a combination node then this function returns nil.
func.remark: See the animation documentation for further explanations of the animation system.

example.text: If there is only one animation being played in slot 5 and its name is "Walk" then that animation is stopped.
